test_cases.name: Good Deal - Should PASS

input.text: Beautiful 3-bedroom house for sale at 123 Main Street, Austin, TX 78701. Price: $250,000. 1,500 square feet. 2 bathrooms. Built in 2010. Large lot with backyard. Perfect for families.

test_cases.notes: Meets multiple criteria: good price per sqft ($166/sqft), target price range, 3 bedrooms, good size

test_cases.name: Expensive Property - Should REJECT

input.text: Luxury 5-bedroom mansion at 456 Oak Avenue, Beverly Hills, CA 90210. $2,500,000. 4,000 sqft. 4.5 bathrooms. Built in 2020.

test_cases.notes: Too expensive, too large, outside price range

test_cases.name: Small Condo - Borderline

input.text: Cozy 1-bedroom condo at 789 Pine Street, Seattle, WA 98101. $180,000. 650 sqft. 1 bathroom. Built in 2005.

test_cases.notes: Small size, only 1 bedroom, might score low

test_cases.name: Townhouse in Range

input.text: Modern townhouse for sale at 321 Elm Drive, Denver, CO 80202. $320,000. 1,800 sqft. 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms. Built in 2015.

test_cases.notes: Townhouse preferred type, good size, in price range

webhook_test_commands.curl: curl -X POST https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/real-estate-deal -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"text": "3-bedroom house, $250k, 1500 sqft, Austin TX"}'
webhook_test_commands.python:
import requests
response = requests.post('https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/real-estate-deal', json={'text': '3-bedroom house, $250k, 1500 sqft, Austin TX'})
print(response.json())
